Title: Northern Lights
Plot: Dawson makes the radical move of dropping out of film class to spend some time re-evaluating his teenage years. Back at Potter's, Joey is torn between attending Pacey's opening night and her date with A.J., who has come to Capeside for the evening. At the play, Andie must take over as director when the faculty director takes ill; and Jen agrees to meet Henry, but she throws him another block by bringing Grams as her date.
GuestStars: Robin Dunne, Bianca Lawson, Stephen Michael Ayers, Maribeth Ayers, Chris Hill
